00023 #ifndef mcpDac_h
00024 #define mcpDac_h
00025 
00026 #include <avr/io.h>
00027 #include <pin_to_avr.h>
00028 
00029 // LDAC may be connected to ground to save a pin
00030 // Set USE_MCP_DAC_LDAC to 0 if LDAC is grounded
00031 #define USE_MCP_DAC_LDAC 1
00032 
00033 // To change a pin assignment edit the #define for
00034 // DDR, PORT, and BIT.  See the file pin_to_avr.h
00035 
00036 // use arduino pins 2,3,4,5 for DAC
00037 
00038 // pin 2 is DAC chip select
00039 #define MCP_DAC_CS_DDR  PIN2_DDRREG
00040 #define MCP_DAC_CS_PORT PIN2_PORTREG
00041 #define MCP_DAC_CS_BIT  PIN2_BITNUM
00042 
00043 // pin 3 is DAC serial clock
00044 #define MCP_DAC_SCK_DDR  PIN3_DDRREG
00045 #define MCP_DAC_SCK_PORT PIN3_PORTREG
00046 #define MCP_DAC_SCK_BIT  PIN3_BITNUM
00047 
00048 // pin 4 is DAC serial data in
00049 #define MCP_DAC_SDI_DDR  PIN4_DDRREG
00050 #define MCP_DAC_SDI_PORT PIN4_PORTREG
00051 #define MCP_DAC_SDI_BIT  PIN4_BITNUM
00052 
00053 // pin 5 is LDAC if used
00054 #if USE_MCP_DAC_LDAC
00055 #define MCP_DAC_LDAC_DDR  PIN5_DDRREG
00056 #define MCP_DAC_LDAC_PORT PIN5_PORTREG
00057 #define MCP_DAC_LDAC_BIT  PIN5_BITNUM
00058 #endif  // USE_MCP_DAC_LDAC
00059 
00060 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 // set DAC CS low
00062 static inline void mcpDacCsLow(void ) {
00063   MCP_DAC_CS_PORT &= ~_BV(MCP_DAC_CS_BIT);
00064 }
00065 // set DAC CS high
00066 static inline void mcpDacCsHigh(void) {
00067   MCP_DAC_CS_PORT |= _BV(MCP_DAC_CS_BIT);
00068 }
00069 // set DAC SCK low
00070 static inline void mcpDacSckLow(void) {
00071   MCP_DAC_SCK_PORT &= ~_BV(MCP_DAC_SCK_BIT);
00072 }
00073 // set DAC SCK high
00074 static inline void mcpDacSckHigh(void) {
00075   MCP_DAC_SCK_PORT |= _BV(MCP_DAC_SCK_BIT);
00076 }
00077 // set DAC SDI low
00078 static inline void mcpDacSdiLow(void) {
00079   MCP_DAC_SDI_PORT &= ~_BV(MCP_DAC_SDI_BIT);
00080 }
00081 // set DAC SDI high
00082 static inline void mcpDacSdiHigh(void) {
00083   MCP_DAC_SDI_PORT |= _BV(MCP_DAC_SDI_BIT);
00084 }
00085 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 // pulse DAC SCK pin
00087 static inline void mcpDacSckPulse(void) {
00088   mcpDacSckHigh();
00089   mcpDacSckLow();
00090 }
00091 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // send bit b of d
00093 static inline void mcpDacSendBit(uint16_t d, uint8_t b) {
00094   if (d & _BV(b)) {
00095     mcpDacSdiHigh();
00096   } else {
00097     mcpDacSdiLow();
00098   }
00099   mcpDacSckPulse();
00100 }
00101 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 // init dac I/O ports
00103 inline void mcpDacInit(void) {
00104   // set all to output mode
00105   MCP_DAC_CS_DDR |= _BV(MCP_DAC_CS_BIT);
00106   MCP_DAC_SCK_DDR |= _BV(MCP_DAC_SCK_BIT);
00107   MCP_DAC_SDI_DDR |= _BV(MCP_DAC_SDI_BIT);
00108   // chip select high
00109   mcpDacCsHigh();
00110 
00111 #if USE_MCP_DAC_LDAC
00112   // LDAC low always - use unbuffered mode
00113   MCP_DAC_LDAC_DDR |= _BV(MCP_DAC_LDAC_BIT);
00114   MCP_DAC_LDAC_PORT &= ~_BV(MCP_DAC_LDAC_BIT);
00115 #endif  // USE_MCP_DAC_LDAC
00116 }
00117 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 // send 12 bits to dac
00119 // trusted compiler to optimize and it does
00120 // csLow to csHigh takes 8 - 9 usec on a 16 MHz Arduino
00121 static inline void mcpDacSend(uint16_t data) {
00122   mcpDacCsLow();
00123   // send DAC config bits
00124   mcpDacSdiLow();
00125   mcpDacSckPulse();  // DAC A
00126   mcpDacSckPulse();  // unbuffered
00127   mcpDacSdiHigh();
00128   mcpDacSckPulse();  // 1X gain
00129   mcpDacSckPulse();  // no SHDN
00130   // send 12 data bits
00131   mcpDacSendBit(data, 11);
00132   mcpDacSendBit(data, 10);
00133   mcpDacSendBit(data,  9);
00134   mcpDacSendBit(data,  8);
00135   mcpDacSendBit(data,  7);
00136   mcpDacSendBit(data,  6);
00137   mcpDacSendBit(data,  5);
00138   mcpDacSendBit(data,  4);
00139   mcpDacSendBit(data,  3);
00140   mcpDacSendBit(data,  2);
00141   mcpDacSendBit(data,  1);
00142   mcpDacSendBit(data,  0);
00143   mcpDacCsHigh();
00144 }
00145 #endif  // mcpDac_h
